summary: This is a brief email from a Deputy United States Attorney at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, sent on November 8, 2019, requesting a few minutes to chat about Epstein. It indicates internal communication within the prosecution team handling the Epstein case.

persons.name: Deputy United States Attorney
persons.context: The sender of the email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, requesting a chat about Epstein.

events.title: Internal SDNY Email About Epstein
events.description: A Deputy United States Attorney at the SDNY sends an email requesting a few minutes to chat about Epstein.

locations: U.S. Attorney's Office Southern District of New York
keyFacts: Internal communication within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York regarding Jeffrey Epstein occurred on November 8, 2019.
The email indicates ongoing discussions or coordination about the Epstein case among federal prosecutors.
The correspondence is brief and does not reveal specific details of the intended conversation.
